derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: of unknown origin; often said to be named after a physician who invented it, but no such person has been traced

entry.def: A condom is a covering made of thin rubber which a man can wear on his penis as a contraceptive or as protection against disease during sexual intercourse.

means.word_mean: 1. contraceptive device consisting of a thin rubber or latex sheath worn over the penis during intercourse

sentences.en: When a woman finds lipstick stains on her husband’s clothing or unfamiliar condoms in his pocket, it brings out the worst in her.
sentences.cn: 当一个女人在丈夫的衣服上发现口红印记或者在他的口袋中见到自己没见过的避孕套时，这对她来说是最坏的事了，什么事都做得出来。
